snippet: Jeep Cherokee and Liberty models from certain model years were added to the investigation, which was opened by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration in August 2010. The investigation applies to 5.1 million vehicles.
abstract: Jeep Cherokee and Liberty models from certain model years were added to the investigation, which was opened by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration in August 2010. The investigation applies to 5.1 million vehicles.

headline.main: Government Expands Investigation Into Fire Risk of Jeep Grand Cherokee
